attributes.action: Make Sainsbury's Pay me more because they don't have an overtime rate!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is pretty self-explanatory. I would just like my government to take an interest in my affairs. I believe that sainsburys not paying a fair overtime rate is disgraceful. Please sign this petition and help me!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
